lines.text: Things that try to look like things often do look more like things than things. Well known fact. But I don't hold with encouraging in it!
I don't hold with looking at the future... But now I think the future's looking at me. And I don't like its expression.
People is gonna come looking. Serious people. Serious-looking. Pull-down-the-walls-and-burn-of-the-thatch looking.

[screeches and laughs aloud]
When shall we three meet again?
Well, I can do next Tuesday.
Oh, a sub-sect of the Turnwise Klatch philosophical system of Sumthin'. An interesting aspect is the asking of apparently nonsensical questions in order to widen the doors of percep...
Good boy! Now, anyone got any 'bacci?
If I'd had to buy you, you wouldn't've been worth the price.
There's times when even a king needs to be alone.
